name: Zombie Raft
description:
The apocalypse is upon us. Scavenge, expand and survive against the zombie horde!



- Keep moving forward! Collect resources by moving your zombie squashing vehicle forward by any means necessary!

- Defend yourself and your fellow survivors against the looming zombie threat

- Expand your apocalypse vehicle to conquer the barren wastelands

- Buy upgrades to protect your survivors from a grizzly fate

- Discover stranded survivors and choose to save them. Who will live? Who will die?
